rows.label: tlk41700172_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, are you planning on starting
a great war in this city?

rows.label: tlk41700172_02_msg0002
rows.name:
The Invidian and Superbian
armies are gathering in Acedia.

rows.label: tlk41700172_02_msg0003
rows.name:
You've got a Blade with you, so you
must have some information, right?

rows.label: tlk41700172_02_msg0004
rows.name:
...What's this? You can't leak important
information to a refugee? Whose fault
do you think this is...? Hmph!
